text: Michael Buble and his wife Luisana Lopilato are waiting for the arrival of baby no. 3 and it ’ s a girl! The singer revealed the sex of their third child in an interview with Today FM. Buble was asked how his family is doing and the “ Haven ’ t Met You Yet'' singer replied by saying, “ Everything ’ s good, and I ’ ve got my first little girl coming in about three weeks. I ’ ve actually never said that before in public. I ’ ve got a daughter coming. ” The couple ’ s baby girl will join their two sons, 4 - year - old Noah and 2 - year - old Elias.
